title: A Warm Winter - Behind the Scenes!

media:group.media:title: A Warm Winter - Behind the Scenes!
media:group.media:description:
WOW! Never thought I'd be able to finish this project. So, so many things I had to figure out on the fly. So many. So... many...

Anyways, I'll be showing a breakdown of how I created the animation! There are a god-awful number of steps, but I'll try and keep it short ðŸ˜Ž
